plays.text: Penalty to Andreas Dackell 2 minutes for Hooking Jaroslav Modry
Goal scored by Arron Asham assisted by Patrick Poulin and Stephane Robidas
Penalty to Aaron Miller 2 minutes for Boarding DOUGLAS GILMOUR
Penalty to Patrice Brisebois 2 minutes for Crosschecking Steve Heinze
Goal scored by Nelson Emerson assisted by Jason Allison and Jaroslav Modry
Penalty to Mikko Eloranta 2 minutes for Holding ANDREI MARKOV
Penalty to Aaron Miller 2 minutes for Crosschecking Richard Zednik
Goal scored by Yanic Perreault assisted by Stephane Robidas and Craig Rivet
